title: Dual-Tone Grandeur: Contemporary Bridal Haaram with Matching Jhumkas
materials: 18K White and Rose Gold. Featuring intricate openwork design elements. Hypoallergenic alloy used for comfortable wear.
features: This stunning Haaram features a contemporary design with a cascading arrangement of stylized geometric and paisley motifs. The two-tone gold (white and rose gold) creates a striking visual contrast. The necklace has a central pendant comprised of linked square elements, echoed in the matching Jhumkas. The openwork filigree details exemplify skilled craftsmanship. The jhumkas mirror the design, creating a coordinated and captivating set.
occasions: and grand celebrations. A modern twist on traditional bridal jewelry.
description: This Haaram set is a masterpiece of modern design blended with a touch of traditional elegance. The two-tone gold offers a unique and contemporary look. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear. A statement piece that will elevate any bridal or formal attire.
